Articles.Content: So my MacAfee trial is running out tomorrow on my new pc... I need some new antivirus that is free but good and not a bunch of ad ware. I used to have AVG which was good except for the ad ware.
avast! is good. No adware as far as I know.

I use Microsoft security essentials and Ccleaner. The main question is: How many questionable sites do you access a day, and how much do you download weekly? You may need something more depending on how good you are about spotting questionable content on the fly.
I use McAfee and malwarebytes, though that only scans when you make it, it's quite thorough.
I never to go questionable sites unless I click the wrong thing but am usually downloading things like mods constnatly.

avast! is good. No adware as far as I know.

I'm hesitant to recommend Avast!, while it does seem very effective the software is very annoying and high profile, it tries very hard to ensure you pay attention to it even when trying to uninstall it, it's very clingy.
